name: Panther Family Sim: Jungle
description:
Dive into the life of the wild panther as you hunt with your mate, create a family, breed cute cubs and upgrade your home in Panther Family Sim!

Explore a huge 3D world full of dangerous locations in this wild animal RPG. Raise your own Panther Family and have fun with your Cubs who need a lot of attention! Feed and play with your cubs and live with your family in your beautiful home with no disturbances. Upgrade your home with awesome features including shelter, heaven bridge, stunning lakes, ancient dinosaur bones and much more!

Hunt down enemies including buffalo, cheetah, elephant, fish, flamingo, gazelle, giraffe, goat, gorilla, hippo, jaguar and more as you gain access to new 3D locations! Have fun in the best panther simulator out there!

PANTHER FAMILY SIM FEATURES:

RAISE A PANTHER FAMILY WITH YOUR MATE
- Find your soulmate and start your family.
- Take care of your cubs by hunting for them, going on adventures and teaching them how to fight!
- Play with your cubs before they grow up and go into the wild on their own
- Customize family members to change their fur colors

AWESOME HOME
- The home is the central part of life for the panther family.
- Live in an awesome home that is safe for your family with no disturbances.
- Upgrade your home with over 23 items including heaven bridge, the statue of master Chee and much more.

STUNNING 3D WORLD WITH MULTIPLE LOCATIONS
- The massive stunning 3D world is waiting to be explored!
- Explore the 3D world with your panther mate and panther family to discover all kinds of surprises!
- Hunt in the desert, various islands, the wild forest, jungles and more awesome locations coming soon!

WILD ANIMAL RPG GAMEPLAY
- Various attacks and special skills: fear attack, stealth attack and pounce on prey
- Adventures and challenging quests: complete quests for experience and money to upgrade your family and home
- Unlock achievements by completing different tasks
- Unlock special abilities like swimming, slash attach and sniper attack

DAY-NIGHT CYCLE
- Real day and night cycles with unexpected weather
- Be careful hunting at night as some monsters become stronger and faster!
- Night vision is coming soon to help if you’re lost at night to find way back home by constellations in the night sky

LEADERBOARDS (coming soon)
- See how other player’s panther ranks by level, experience and gold!

Start a family in the best wild animal simulator Panther Family Sim, the only RPG that lets you experience life as a panther!

Download now for hours of wild fun!
